sen.j: 観世元正（かんぜ もとまさ、1930年（昭和5年） - 1990年（平成2年））は、シテ方観世流能楽師。
sen.e: Motomasa KANZE (1930-1990) was a shite actor (a principal actor) of the Kanze school of Noh.
Motomasa KANZE (1930-1990) was a shite actor (a principal actor) of the Kanze school of Noh.
Motomasa KANZE (1930-1990) was a shite actor (a principal actor) of the Kanze school of Noh.
The twenty fifth head of the Kanze family.
The twenty-fifth head of the Kanze family.
sen.cmt: ハイフンを追加しました。
sen.e: The twenty-fifth head of the Kanze family.
He announced himself as Sakon KANZE.
He announced himself as Sakon KANZE.
He announced himself as Sakon KANZE.
He was the eldest son of Motoshige KANZE.
He was the eldest son of Motoshige KANZE.
He was the eldest son of Motoshige KANZE.

sen.j: 『観世流昭和大成版謡本』を刊行。
sen.e: He published "Kanze Ryu Showa Taiseiban Yohon" (Complete Collection of the Kanze School Noh Songs Composed in Showa Period).
sen.cmt: 定訳不明→『観世流昭和大成版謡本』
sen.e: He published "Kanze Ryu Showa Taiseiban Yohon" (Complete Collection of the Kanze School Noh Songs Composed in Showa Period).
He published "Kanze Ryu Showa Taiseiban Yohon" (Complete Collection of the Kanze School Noh Songs Composed in Showa Period).

sen.j: 観世宗家が公認する、現行の観世流謡本である。
sen.e: This is the existing Kanze school Noh song books officially approved by the Kanze family.
This is the existing Kanze school Noh song books officially approved by the Kanze family.
This is the existing Kanze school Noh song books officially approved by the Kanze family.

sen.j: 長男が観世清和、次男が山階弥右衛門（観世芳宏改メ）、三男が観世芳信。
sen.e: His eldest son is Kiyokazu KANZE, the second son is Yaemon YAMASHINA (later changed his name as Yoshihiro KANZE), and the third son is Yoshinobu KANZE.
